title: Advanced Reasoning Models
description: Season 2 kicks off with a deep dive into advanced reasoning models, exploring how models like DeepSeek R1 and Azure OpenAI's o-series are pushing the boundaries of problem-solving and decision-making.

spotlight.title: Building a Deep Researcher with DeepSeek R1 and LangChain
spotlight.description: Hands-on demonstration of leveraging reasoning models to build intelligent research applications using DeepSeek and LangChain.

resources.title: How to use reasoning models with Microsoft Foundry

highlights.title: Microsoft Foundry Model Catalog Expansion
highlights.description: New models from DeepSeek, XAI, Meta, and Mistral now available under Microsoft service terms.

highlights.title: Video Playground Launch
highlights.description: New prompt-to-video generation capability in Microsoft Foundry with exportable code.

highlights.title: Model Router GA
highlights.description: Automatic model selection optimizing for cost and performance now generally available.

highlights.title: Grok 3 Models Available
highlights.description: Grok 3 and Grok 3 Mini with long context and advanced reasoning now in catalog.

highlights.title: DeepSeek R1-10528 Release
highlights.description: Improved reasoning with hallucination blocking, ideal for agents and co-pilots.

title: Microsoft Foundry Model Router
description: What if you could always pick the perfect model, instantly? See Foundry Model Router make split-second decisions that save money and boost performance.

spotlight.title: Model Router Deep Dive
spotlight.description: Core AI PM Lead Sanjeev Jagtap discusses the GA announcement at Microsoft Ignite and demonstrates real-world applications.

resources.title: AI Tour Lab: Automate Model Selection

customerStory.title: Adobe Document Intelligence
customerStory.description: How Adobe leverages model routing for document processing at scale.

highlights.title: Model Router GA Announcement
highlights.description: Microsoft Foundry Model Router reaches general availability at Ignite 2025.

studyCorner.lesson: L0: Introduction to Models for Beginners
studyCorner.description: Overview of the Models for Beginners curriculum and learning path.

title: Red Teaming for AI Safety
description: Learn how to safeguard your AI agents with red teaming techniques and automated adversarial testing in Microsoft Foundry.

spotlight.title: AI Red Teaming Agent in Microsoft Foundry
spotlight.description: Hands-on exploration of automated red teaming tools and techniques for securing AI applications.

studyCorner.description: Understanding the fundamentals of large language models and how they work.

title: Foundry Local: Edge AI Applications
description: Explore how to deploy AI models locally and at the edge using Microsoft Foundry Local capabilities.

spotlight.title: Edge AI for Beginners
spotlight.description: Introduction to deploying models at the edge with hands-on examples and best practices.

studyCorner.description: Exploring models that work with text, images, audio, and video.
Deep dive into reasoning models and their applications.
